sentences.en: Ain't nothing more damn frightening than driving with a cougar in the car.
sentences.cn: 还有比开车时边上边上还蹲着一只美洲狮更吓人的吗!

sentences.en: And the rare spotting of a cougar, wolf or woodland caribou takes our breath away.
sentences.cn: 偶尔看到美洲狮 、 狼或者林地驯鹿,会让我们激动到窒息!

sentences.en: As soon as it went underneath the light, I saw that it was a cougar.
sentences.cn: 当它走到灯光下的时候我才看出那是只美洲豹.

sentences.en: Claw marks, from a big cat, most likely a cougar.
sentences.cn: 留下的爪印, 源自大型猫科动物, 很可能是一只美洲狮.

sentences.en: Finally, the cougar ran off and Mrs. McAlister held her children and was thankful they were safe.
sentences.cn: 最后美洲狮跑开了，阿里斯特太太抱着她的孩子，很欣慰他们都平安无事。

sentences.en: I have never seen a cougar.
I saw a cougar slinking toward its prey.
sentences.cn: 我看到一只美洲狮正在潜随猎物.

sentences.en: Now they ought to be listed with other endangered species like the Eastern cougar and Kemp's Ridley turtle.
sentences.cn: 如今，它们应该同濒临灭绝东部美洲狮和肯氏龟一起列入濒危物种的名录。

sentences.en: Optima Cougar - Optima has finally entered the highracer market with the new Cougar.
sentences.cn: 最优美洲豹 - 最优终于进入highracer市场与新的美洲豹.

sentences.en: That man was on the prod and as dangerous as a cornered cougar.
sentences.cn: 那人大发雷霆,危险得如同一头被困的美洲豹.

sentences.en: The boy fled into his home, yelling A cougar is eating Angel! ""
sentences.cn: 男孩逃回家中, 大喊:“一直美洲豹在咬安琪儿! ”

sentences.en: Then Mrs. McAlister grabbed a shovel in the yard and swung it at the cougar.
sentences.cn: 于是阿里斯特太太抓起后院的一把铁锹对着美洲狮挥来挥去。

sentences.en: They went nuts over the Cougar.
sentences.cn: 他们对美洲豹车看得入迷.

sentences.en: We did use a live animal to promote the Cougar.
sentences.cn: 我们倒的确使用了一头活的动物来推销美洲豹车.

words.tran_cn: [脊椎]美洲狮，美洲豹（特指Felis concolor）

trans.tran_cn: <美>美洲狮，（追求年轻帅哥的）熟女
trans.tran_en: a large brown wild cat from the mountains of western North America and South America
